verses.roman:
rādhā vasi' āche, kibā vṛndāvane yāya
tāhāṅ yadi ācambite kṛṣṇa-daraśana pāya

synonyms: rādhā vasi' āche—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī is sitting; kibā—or; vṛndāvane yāya—is going to Vṛndāvana; tāhāṅ—there; yadi—if; ācambite—all of a sudden; kṛṣṇa-daraśana pāya—gets the opportunity to see Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "Sometimes when Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī is sitting or when She is going to Vṛndāvana, She sometimes sees Kṛṣṇa.
